Title: June 2024
Content: *p75779ra02428*do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this areado not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area24  *(c) three students were asked to carry out a single chemical test to unambiguously identify the presence of the oh group in the three terpenoid compounds, menthol, linalool and citronellol.ohhoohmenthollinaloolcitronellol the first student tried using acidified potassium dichromate(vi) to oxidise thealcohols. the second tried acidified potassium manganate(vii), an oxidising agent similar topotassiumdichromate(vi). the third student tried using phosphorus(v)chloride. criticise the three students suggestions by linking the expected results, and the actual observations that would be made, for each test and the structures of the three alcohols.(6)
